Notes: Apache version 2.4  or NGINX 1.14 or later are recommended.
Versions 5.5, 5.6 or 5.7 are supported. MySQL 8.0 is not yet supported. Make sure your MySQL installation supports InnoDB tables. CollectiveAccess requires InnoDB support to function properly.
PHP version 5.6 or better is required. PHP 7.0 or later is strongly recommended. Note that the current version of CollectiveAccess, 1.7, will be the last to support PHP 5.6.
